channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As Nvidia’s stock gains, one analyst shows why Stargate could be so significant
item.description: Will Nvidia become part of the “Trump trade?” Melius Research says the new Stargate joint venture may signal more AI-friendly moves ahead and help the...

item.title: Treasury Yields Rise a Little as Tariffs Are Delayed
item.description: Treasury yields edged up, reclaiming some lost ground as markets digest Trump’s relatively mild approach to tariffs at the start of his second term.

item.title: For federal workers, Trump’s return-to-office order amounts to an unwelcome pay cut
item.description: The approaching return to full-time in-person work will cost remote and hybrid workers hundreds, if not thousands, of dollars per year.

item.title: What is the biggest money mistake people make?

item.title: Sterling Could Recover if U.K. Government Boosts Economic Prospects
item.description: Sterling could recover against the euro in coming months if the U.K. government works to improve consumer and business confidence, Commerzbank said. S...

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Edge Higher
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures recovered some of Tuesday’s heavy losses with freezing weather continuing this week across much of the country and traders ke...

item.title: ‘We are shocked and upset’: My mother died and her second husband said he now owns everything. Is this true?
item.description: “My husband and I tolerated him, but overall we never got close to him.”

item.title: Nasdaq Leads Gains as Netflix Stock Jumps
item.description: The S&P 500, Nasdaq and Dow industrials all notched gains as AI-linked stocks surged.

item.title: Schwab’s stock lagged rivals such as Robinhood last year. Here’s why it could be a buy now.
item.description: Revenue growth and industry deregulation are likely welcome tailwinds for the retail brokerage.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise Amid Tariff Threats
item.description: Gold futures rose, with tariff threats set to keep demand high.
